title: MD
biography: Yuan Longping was a Chinese agronomist and inventor. He was a member of the Chinese Academy of Engineering known for developing the first hybrid rice varieties in the 1970s, part of the Green Revolution in agriculture. For his contributions, Yuan is known as the "Father of Hybrid Rice". Yuan was bestowed the Medal of the Republic, the highest honorary medal of the People's Republic of China, in September 2019.
aiSummary: Yuan Longping is a nutrition science specialist with an H-index of 67 at Hybrid Rice Research Center (Member). Has been published in Science, Nature Medicine, Cell. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
